title: Rune Page Compensation
body: Ok, so i was still wondering about the compensation about runes and runepages, my question is "how would you compensate if you bought runepages with rp, will I get the rp back as compensation or how would it work?"

replies.body: We don't have any info or updates on that, aside from what's been posted already on the League site or [pinned ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/To8OjvVY-regarding-runes-reforged)thread.  Hang tight, and our devs will update us with more info when ready!
